Crimson optics scanned the area surrounding Maxima. Full internal scanners =
as well as radar keeping tabs of as many as possible and stealth raised to =
keep her from being detected. The joys of being a full, proper Decepticon. =
It was equipment that she once had like this she missed utilizing. By now, =
she was a master at it. 

Keeping out of visual range of anyone for the tim=
e being however, she was keeping visual tabs upon the location where Hydras=
 and the others were now located. 

"My dear MAxima, still there?" came the=
 voice over her comm system from Hydras. 

"Yes, I am here," she replied. O=
ptics still scanning the location.
